column5: We always stop at Dutchie's on 105 going to Ear Falls. We will stop there, get a 6-pack of 'Batts and drink it on the shore of the lake across the road. However this is the first time we will be driving up on a Sunday. I had heard that there are no beer sales on Sunday. Is this true?
You may have forgotten but I didn't:https://www.walleyecentral.com/forums...ht=Dutchie%27s JDP P.S. I would give Dutchie's a call to confirm.
Thanx JDP; I had forgotten - the only thing I remembered is that I didn't have an answer. Anyway, I called them up and found out that they DO sell beer on Sunday.
But NOT on the Queen's birthday! (Victoria Day, the Monday on or before May 24.)
